structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Duties when county attorney is absent.
law.text: In the absence of the county attorney, the first assistant shall act as county attorney, and in the absence of the county attorney and the first assistant, the second assistant shall act as county attorney. The assistants shall not receive additional compensation for acting as county attorney.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 136a-4, 136a-8.
